attributes.action: Create Accident and Emergency units for animals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pet owners, whose companion becomes ill or suffers injury outside the Monday-Friday 9-5 can face bills of up to £400 just for that one incident. The Blue cross, as admirable as their work is, are only there for those on welfare - not for low paid workers. All I ask is for each town/city in England to have an A&E department for pets (or wild animals harmed by cars/hunting etc) paid for by central government or the local authority.
